Package org.opengis.metadata.constraint

Constraints information (includes legal and security).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Constraints
    Restrictions on the access and use of a resource or metadata.
    LegalConstraints
    Restrictions and legal prerequisites for accessing and using the resource.
    SecurityConstraints
    Handling restrictions imposed on the resource for national security or similar security concerns.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Classification
    Name of the handling restrictions on the dataset.
    Restriction
    Limitation(s) placed upon the access or use of the data.

Package org.opengis.metadata.constraint Description

Constraints information (includes legal and security). The following is adapted from OpenGIS® Metadata (Topic 11) specification.

This package contains information concerning the restrictions placed on data. The constraints entity is optional and may be specified as legal constraints and/or security constraints. The other constraint element shall be non-null (used) only if access constraints and/or use constraints elements have a value of "other restrictions".

Since:
2.0
